languages.text: "Прошу не забывать, госпожа Йегер, с кем вы разговариваете. Следите за словами".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Прошу не забывать, госпожа Йегер, что вы разговариваете с Вольным Торговцем, и подобная манера общения категорически неприемлема".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."
languages.original_text: "Прошу не забывать, госпожа Йегер, с кем вы разговариваете. Следите за словами".

traits.locale_text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Mind your words."
"I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Mind your words."
"I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."
"I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."
"I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."
"I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."

languages.text: "Ich bitte Euch, nicht zu vergessen, wen Ihr ansprecht, Meisterin Yeager. Achtet auf Eure Worte."
languages.original_text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte Euch, nicht zu vergessen, wen Ihr ansprecht, Meisterin Yeager. Achtet auf Eure Worte."

languages.text: « Je vous prie de ne pas oublier à qui vous vous adressez, maîtresse Yeager. Choisissez vos mots avec soin. »
languages.original_text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de ne pas oublier à qui vous vous adressez, maîtresse Yeager. Choisissez vos mots avec soin. »

languages.text: “耶格尔女士，希望你不要忘记是在与谁进行对话。注意你的措辞。”
languages.original_text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."

traits.locale_text: “耶格尔女士，希望你不要忘记是在与谁进行对话。注意你的措辞。”

languages.text: «Le ruego que no olvide a quién se está dirigiendo, maestra Yeager. Elija bien sus palabras».
languages.original_text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."

traits.locale_text: «Le ruego que no olvide a quién se está dirigiendo, maestra Yeager. Elija bien sus palabras».

languages.text: 「イェーガー殿。誰に話しかけているのかをお忘れなきよう。言葉にはお気をつけください」
languages.original_text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."

traits.locale_text: 「イェーガー殿。誰に話しかけているのかをお忘れなきよう。言葉にはお気をつけください」

languages.text: "Kimi muhatap aldığınızı unutmamanızı rica ediyorum Yeager Hanım. Sözlerinize dikkat edin."
languages.original_text: "I ask that you not forget whom you are addressing, Mistress Yeager. Be mindful of your words."

traits.locale_text: "Kimi muhatap aldığınızı unutmamanızı rica ediyorum Yeager Hanım. Sözlerinize dikkat edin."
